field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the tile to display
field.required: You must enter a title for this filter facet

field.label: Facet Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the filter facet
field.required: You must enter a name for this filter facet

field.label: Configuration
field.hint: Enter a configuration name

field.label: Display Flag
field.hint: Shows/hides the filter facet
field.required: This field is required: true / false

field.label: Statistic Item Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the statistic item to configure.
field.required: You must enter a title for this statistic

field.label: Statistic description
field.hint: Enter the description text for the statistic item to configure.

field.label: Statistic Item Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the statistic item to configure.
field.required: You must enter a name for this statistic

field.label: Display Flag
field.hint: Shows/hides statistic item
field.required: This field is required: true / false

field.label: Download Flag
field.hint: Enables/disables statistic download.
field.required: This field is required: true / false

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the text as title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a text

field.label: About Page Text
field.hint: Enter the text to show in About Page.
field.required: You must enter a text

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the person.

field.label: Surname
field.hint: Enter the surname of the person.
field.required: This field is required.

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the person.

field.label: Surname
field.hint: Enter the surname of the person.
field.required: This field is required.

field.label: Salutation
field.hint: The salutation used to address an individual, such as Dr., Ms., Mrs., Mr., etc.

field.label: Organization Name
field.hint: Enter the Organization name of the person.

field.label: Position Name
field.hint: Enter the Position name of the person.

field.label: eMail Address
field.hint: Enter the eMail Address of the person.

field.label: Information about the contact's telephone
field.hint: Enter the Phone number of the person.

field.label: Delivery point
field.hint: The location for postal deliveries.

field.label: City
field.hint: The name of the city for the contact.

field.label: Administrative area
field.hint: The political area of a country.

field.label: Postal code
field.hint: The postal code is equivalent to a U.S. zip code, or the number used for routing to an international address.

field.label: Country
field.hint: The name of the country for the contact's address.

field.label: Online Link
field.hint: A link to associated online information, usually a web site.

field.label: User Identifier
field.hint: An identifier that links this party to a directory of individuals

field.label: Directory
field.hint: The directory system within which the directoryId can be retrieved.

field.label: Title
field.hint: A brief description of the resource, providing enough detail to differentiate it from other similar resources.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Short Name
field.hint: A short name that describes the resource, sometimes a filename.

field.label: Alternate Identifier
field.hint: A secondary identifier for this entity.

field.label: Purpose
field.hint: A synopsis of the purpose of this dataset.

field.label: Introduction
field.hint: An overview of the background and context for the dataset.

field.label: Getting Started
field.hint: A high level overview of interpretation, structure, and content of the dataset.

field.label: Acknowledgements
field.hint: Text that acknowledges funders and other key contributors.

field.label: Date of Publication
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Keyword information
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Additional Information
field.hint: Any extra information pertitent to the resource.

field.label: Intellectual Property Rights
field.hint: Intellectual property rights regarding usage and licensing of this resource.

field.label: Geographic Coverage
field.hint: Fill in the fields to create geographic coverage

field.label: Maintenance Description
field.hint: A text description of the maintenance of this data resource.

field.label: Maintenance Update Frequency
field.hint: Frequency with which changes and additions are made to the dataset after the initial dataset is completed.

field.label: Change History
field.hint: A description of changes made to the data since its release.

field.label: Temporal Coverage
field.hint: A time range signifying the begin and end of some period

field.label: General taxonomic coverage
field.hint: Enter a description of the range of taxa addressed in the data set or collection.

field.label: Taxonomic classification
field.hint: Information about the range of taxa addressed in the data set or collection.

field.label: Method Description
field.hint: Description of a specific step of the method.

field.label: Project Title
field.hint: Title of the Project.

field.label: Personnel Role
field.hint: Contact and role information for people involved in the research project.

field.label: Project Abstract
field.hint: Descriptive abstract that summarizes information about the research project.

field.label: Project Funding
field.hint: Funding information.

field.label: Award information.
field.hint: Provide specific information about the funding awards.

field.label: Description of the Study Area.
field.hint: Description of the physical area associated with the research project, potentially including coverage, climate, geology, disturbances, etc.

field.label: Description of research design
field.hint: Description of the design of the research project

field.label: Semantic Annotation
field.hint: A precisely-defined semantic statement.

field.label: Associated Party
field.hint: Other people or organizations who should be associated with this resource.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Entity name
field.hint: The name identifies the entity in the dataset: file name, name of database table, etc.

field.label: Entity type
field.hint: Contains the name of the type for this entity.

field.label: Entity description
field.hint: General description of the entity and its contents

field.label: Alternate Identifier
field.hint: A secondary identifier for this entity.

field.label: Data object name
field.hint: The name of the data object.

field.label: Data object size
field.hint: Describes the physical size of the data object, by default represented in bytes

field.label: Character Encoding
field.hint: Contains the name of the character encoding (ASCII , UTF-8 or one of the other common encodings)

field.label: Authentication value
field.hint: A value, typically a checksum, used to authenticate that the bitstream delivered to the user is identical to the original.

field.label: Data Format
field.hint: Describes the internal physical format of a data object.

field.label: Format Name
field.hint: Name of the format of the data object.

field.label: Number of header lines
field.hint: Number of header lines preceding data.

field.label: Record delimiter character
field.hint: Character used to delimit records.

field.label: Field Delimiter character
field.hint: Character used to delimit the end of an attribute, typically commas, tabs, spaces, and semicolons.

field.label: Quote character
field.hint: Character used to quote values for delimiter escaping, typically a " or '

field.label: Orientation of attributes
field.hint: Specifies whether the attributes are found in columns or rows

field.label: Distribution Information
field.hint: Information on how the resource is distributed online and offline

field.label: Attribute list
field.hint: A list of attributes

field.label: Number of records
field.hint: The integer count of the number of records in the dataTable.

field.label: Eml 2.2.0
field.hint: Generated xml file from dataset metadata.

field.label: Eml validation test
field.hint: Validation result from Eml 2.2.0

field.label: Eml validation test flag
field.hint: true / false

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.
